1.body: Once there was a man named Mondo

2.body: Mondo lived in a small village, populated by poor folk.

3.body: He hated being amongst these people! They were such downers, bro.

4.body: So he set off in search of a precious teasure- some dank.

5.body: Where would he find this dank in the 1400s you ask? Idk.

6.body: Maybe he attacked a dragon n it died n left some sweet dank behind or something.

7.body: Anyway, he brought some sweet dank back to his ol' village and instantly the town as cool af.

8.body: Everyone became rich instantaneously and not boring at all. It was tight aha.

9.body: Moral of the story: Dank fixes everything.
